product_name: FARMACYMini Green Clean Gentle Creamy Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's Green Clean Gentle Creamy Cleanser nourishes and soothes while washing away makeup and buildup to leave dry skin comforted with moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsDissolves makeup and buildupDesigned for normal to sensitive skin and gentle enough for daily useFragrance-free formula is packed with a blend of upcycled moringa, oat, and vitamin F to support your moisture barrier and leave your skin looking healthy and refreshedKey IngredientsMoringa: packed with antioxidants that gently cleanse, soften, and hydrateUpcycled Apple and Oats: lock in moisture to soothe and nourish skinVitamin F: supports your skin barrier with essential fatty acidsResearch ResultsIn a consumer panel on 30 subjects, immediately after use, 100% agreed:Skin felt hydrated post-washSigns of sensitivity/dryness looked reducedThe creamy texture nourished skinThe product provided a gentle yet effective cleanseThe product removed dirt, makeup, and impuritiesItem 2641308How To UseStart with your favorite Farmacy Cleansing Balm (sold separately) to remove makeup.-Then apply Whipped Foaming Cleanser daily AM/PM to wet skin.-Rinse and pat dry.-Avoid direct contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, PCA Glyceryl Oleate, Saccharide Isomerate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Linoleic Acid, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Isethionate, Palmitic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Stearic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Methyltaurate, Oleic Acid, Quartz, Xanthan Gum, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start with your favorite Farmacy Cleansing Balm (sold separately) to remove makeup.-Then apply Whipped Foaming Cleanser daily AM/PM to wet skin.-Rinse and pat dry.-Avoid direct contact with eyes.
